title: Italian for English Speakers
headline: Communicate like an Italian native by learning how to read, write and speak Italian in this free online course.
description: Are you a frequent visitor to Italian-speaking countries? Do you want to learn Italian but aren't sure where to begin? This course will help you build a solid foundation in the Italian language with simple-to-follow and easy-to-remember lessons. Explore useful Italian vocabulary and everyday phrases that include numbers, family terms, emotions and physical descriptions. So dive in and learn Italian in a fun and easy way.
courseDescription:
One of the most beneficial languages to learn is Italian. It is the official language of four countries, spoken in over 11 nations and over 60 million people are native speakers. Are you interested in speaking fluent Italian? This course starts by introducing you to the Italian alphabet and explores the sounds attached to vowels and consonants. Following that, you will learn how to count in Italian with ease. Next, we’ll teach you the words for the seasons, days of the week and months of the year and explain how to use them in sentences. Is your spouse or partner an Italian speaker? Explore family-related words and how to use them to communicate effectively with your Italian-speaking relatives, which shows them that you desire to be a part of them. 

We will teach you the Italian word for parts of the human body and phrases to help you describe your appearance and health conditions. Delivering a detailed description of how our bodies feel can go a long way in assisting a doctor in making an accurate diagnosis. Those who enjoy travelling will find it easier to meet new people in an Italian-speaking environment if they have a repertoire of words and phrases to initiate conversations. You will learn helpful words and phrases that you can use to ask permission, seek help and more. When you travel to a new location, do you like the idea of sampling a variety of foods? We will prepare you with essential vocabulary related to restaurants and how you can order at an Italian restaurant.

We designed this course for people who want to learn and communicate with Italian speakers. This course is an introductory course that requires no prerequisite knowledge of this language. If you find the Italian language or culture interesting or have friends who speak it, this course will help you lay a solid foundation in the language. We split the course into two parts. We first deals with the essential everyday vocabulary and then study commonly used phrases and expressions. Since both English and Italian developed from Latin, Italian is easy to learn as an English speaker due to the similarities between the two languages. Learning a new language also boosts confidence and improves cognitive abilities such as problem-solving. Join the course now and start learning Italian for free!
